title: Mitch Prinstein: "Popular: The Power of Likeability in a Status-Obsessed World"
description: Michael has a conversation with Mitch Prinstein, the American Psychological Association's Chief Science Officer, on his book "Popular: The Power of Likability in a Status-Obsessed World." Original air date 07 June 2017. The book was published on 06 June 2017.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Mitch Prinstein)
